meta.description: GnuTLS with additional TLS-KDH ciphers: Kerberos + Diffie-Hellman

license.fullName: GNU Library General Public License v2.1 or later

meta.long_description:
The ARPA2 project aims to add security. This is an enhanced
version of GnuTLS,  a project that aims to develop a library which
provides a secure layer, over a reliable transport
layer. It adds TLS-KDH ciphers: Kerberos + Diffie-Hellman.
meta.name: gnutls-kdh
